name: Workflowy - bold top level items like headings
description: One simple change: the top level items of the current view will always be in bold (and a bit larger), like titles or headings. Changing the zoom level changes the text that is in bold.
additional_info: The text that is in bold is not defined by you, it is defined by your current view (zoom level). See screenshots. Tags within those items will not be in bold.

discussions.name: Works on child bullets but not on home.
